p: Efficiency of green-synthesized metal AgNPs and AuNPs used as biopesticides against Ae. aegypti that can spread dengue virus and Culex quinquefasciatus or An. stephensi that transmit Zika virus were presented in several papers (e.g., Jampílek and Kráľová 2019d; Govindarajan and Benelli 2017; Lallawmawma et al. 2015; Pavunraj et al. 2017; Ishwarya et al. 2017; Suganya et al. 2017).
